newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korea NLCF buys 20,000T Indian rice bran pellet.
newsitem.headline: S.Korea NLCF buys 20,000T Indian rice bran pellet.

text.p: South Korea's National Livestock Cooperatives Federation (NLCF) bought 10,000 tonnes of Indian rice bran pellet from Nidera and another 10,000 tonnes from G. Premjee, an official of the federation said on Friday.
The official said the federation also bought 15,000 tonnes of Thai tapioca at $88.89 a tonne, C&F, from STC Tapioca Group Co Ltd.
The official said it decided against a tender for another 15,000 tonnes of tapioca due to high offer prices.
The purchases were made in re-tenders after tenders for 30,000 tonnes of tapioca and 20,000 tonnes of rice bran pellet were declined due to high offer prices.
On Tuesday, the federation bought 18,000 tonnes of Chinese cottonseed meal and 15,000 tonnes of Thai tapioca from Toepfer at $86.96 a tonne C&F.
Details of the tender results are as follows:
COMMODS TONNE ETA/ARRIVAL PORT PRICE SELLER
